Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Class ClientImpl

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.ClientImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Client, Observer, Serializable, Remote
public class ClientImpl extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Client, Observer
A class that implements the Client Interface. This class represents both the RMI and Socket Client.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientImpl

      public ClientImpl(boolean isTui) throws RemoteException
      Creates a new client implementation and runs the view (TUI or GUI, based on the provided value).
      Parameters:
      isTui - true if the user requested the TUI version of the application, false if requested the GUI version.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong with the RMI connection.

  • Method Details

    • getView

      public static RunnableView getView()
      Gets the view associated with this Client.
      Returns:
      the view selected by the user.

    • update

      public void update(String playerNameMessage) throws RemoteException
      Sends the provided message to the client handler, containing the name of the player requesting to play.
      Parameters:
      playerNameMessage - the name of the player requesting to play.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong with the RMI connection.

    • update

      public void update(Integer numberOfPlayersMessage) throws RemoteException
      Sends the provided message to the client handler, containing the number of players the game should have.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayersMessage - the number of players the game should have.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong with the RMI connection.

    • update

      public void update(MoveMsg moveMessage) throws RemoteException
      Sends the provided message to the client handler, containing the move the player wants to make.
      Parameters:
      moveMessage - the move that the player wants to make.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong with the RMI connection.

    • update

      public void update(ChatMsg ChatMessage) throws RemoteException
      Sends the provided message to the client handler, containing the message the player wants to send to other player
      Parameters:
      ChatMessage - the message the player wants to send to other players or to a specific one.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong with the RMI connection.

    • update

      public void update(CheatMsg cheatMessage) throws RemoteException
      Sends the provided message to the client handler, containing the message that makes the current player win.
      Parameters:
      cheatMessage - the message to be sent, that tells the client handler to make the current player win.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong with the RMI connection.

    • receiveMessage

      public void receiveMessage(GameViewMsg message) throws RemoteException
      Receives the provided message from the server.
      Specified by:
      receiveMessage in interface Client
      Parameters:
      message - the message the server sent to the client.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong with the RMI connection.

    • setClientHandler

      public void setClientHandler(ClientHandler clientHandler) throws RemoteException
      Sets the client handler to provided one in order to establish a new connection between client and client handler.
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - the client handler to connect the client with.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong with the RMI connection.
